deepl.from.description: Displayed the source language of the text. {0} is the language name. e.g. 'From English'

deepl.improveText.description: Displayed when the user is improving a text

deepl.in.description: Displayed when the user is improving a text. Second row of deepl.improveText. {0} is the language name. e.g. 'In French'

deepl.savedTranslation.description: Displayed when the user is viewing a saved translation

deepl.savedTranslations.description: Displayed when the user is viewing saved translations

deepl.to.description: Displayed the target language of the text. {0} is the language name. e.g. 'To French'

deepl.translateFile.description: Displayed when the user is translating a file

deepl.translateText.description: Displayed when the user is translating a text
